domain.name: Person

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: @elonmusk Well hmmm. coronavirus has killed more Americans in 12 weeks than the Vietnam war killed in 19 years & still going linear up and you are just 😤 you can’t open a factory-Grow up. What about zero in April. I called you out in March too. I own a Tesla and love it but follow science
